item.description:
Last year, fellow drinking buddy, Randy suggested JJ Foley's for our final happy hour. It proved quite popular so let's head there again.

Let's (w)ring out one last happy hour in 2010 at JJ Foley's the Downtown Crossing location

******WARNING WARNING WARNING******

******DOWNTOWN location******



Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Nearby subway stations are Downtown Crossing (orange and red lines), Park (green and red lines), State (blue and orange lines) and South Station (red line and commuter rail). These subway stations are less than a fifteen (15) minute walk.

This is another amateur drinking day (as Luis and Vinnie call it), so I'll be there at 4 to get the prime seats.

Arrive when you can and stay as long as you're able.

The first new member who finds me, gets a free drink. Don't be shy...Say hi

WOW! Another wonderful year of happy times with great drinking buddies. THANK YOU!


PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.how_to_find_us: In the back room gathered around the high tables which are in the middle of the room
item.name: Our Last Happy Hour of Twenty Ten
